nodes.title: Adapt to core Operators hooks now requiring a Context
modify dependencies gs-collections to Eclipse Collections 7.1.0.
use ThreadLocal in SampleConsumer because SimpleDateFormat is thread unsafe.
Take pause into account while rebalancing
Remove info log from ConsumerEventLoop#SubscribeEvent class
GH-233: Wake the consumer when the back pressure is relieved
[chores] Add or fix copyright header of files added in 1.3.x
[chores] Copyright switch Pivotal to VMware, polish headers
GH-144: Fix Doc for Manual Offset Commit
GH-215: Fix Blocking Calls on Sender Thread
GitHub Actions Release Process: signing, artifactory, sonatype
GH-202: Upgrade to use Log4j2 in tests
Fix deprecation and other compiler warnings
GH-193: Always Run close() on the Event Thread
[build] Polish repo.spring.io repositories, remove libs prefix
Switch to GitHub Actions for CI
#175 Make fan-out scenario more reliable by using `tryEmitNext`
Sync with the latest Reactor Core
Do not block when disposing the event loop
Do not access ConsumerFlux's state from tests
Use `Scheduler` directly for the event loop
[build] Backport latest changes to the build around releaser.gradle
Log cause of errors in DefaultKafkaSender
Conditionnally add mavenLocal when releaser script is applied
rework the build scripts, drop `reactor-kafka-tools` module
Use OpenJDK instead of OracleJDK in Travis
Declare an Java9 JPMS Automatic-Module-Name for kafka
[19] Bugfix: After retry no messages delivered to consumer
fix issue with incorrect value adding in case pending is negative
[#72] Apply stopOnError to Producer send Exceptions
hot fix earlier resource dispose in case of terminal signal
fix missed task decoration for Event Scheduler workers
fix some tests, provide limit in verification/blocking duration
update plugins' versions, fix issue with javadoc build
#29 fix OverflowException in Flux.interval when kafka broker is unavailable for some time
#31 fix overflow at requestsPending.addAndGet in case of Long.MAX_VALUE + 1
#21 fix issue with resource dispose during possible termination
#21 fix issue with resource dispose during possible termination
